maml:description.maml:para: Copies DHCP leases from one server to another.

Copies DHCP leases from scopes or an entire DHCP server to the specified destination. Individual scopes can be specified as well. The leases are recreated exactly as they were on the source DHCP instance.
The DHCP server the leases will be copied from.
The DHCP server the leases will be copied to.
Specifies the IP Addresses of the scopes to pull from and copy the leases to. If this is left $null then all leases from all scopes on the source DHCP server will be copied over to the new one.
Specifies to not create any scope reservations that may be found on the source DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.
Specifies the IP Addresses of the scopes to pull from and copy the leases to. If this is left $null then all leases from all scopes on the source DHCP server will be copied over to the new one.
Specifies to not create any scope reservations that may be found on the source DHCP server.
The DHCP server the leases will be copied to.
The DHCP server the leases will be copied from.
Specifies the IP Addresses of the scopes to pull from and copy the leases to. If this is left $null then all leases from all scopes on the source DHCP server will be copied over to the new one.
Specifies to not create any scope reservations that may be found on the source DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.

maml:introduction.maml:para: Copy all leases from a source DHCP server to the localhost
Copy all leases from the specified scopes and exclude any reservations to a remote DHCP server

maml:description.maml:para: Copies a new policy either at the server or scope level.
Either all server, all scope, or specific policies by name will be copied from the source DHCP server to its destination.
The DHCP server the policies will be copied to.
The DHCP server the policies will be copied from.
Specifies specific policy names to copy to the destination server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
The DHCP server the policies will be copied to.
The DHCP server the policies will be copied from.
Specifies specific policy names to copy to the destination server.
Specifies an IP Address of the destination scope to copy the policies to.
Specifies an IP Address of the source server scope to copy the policies from.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.
Specifies specific policy names to copy to the destination server.
Specifies an IP Address of the destination scope to copy the policies to.
Specifies an IP Address of the source server scope to copy the policies from.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.
Specifies specific policy names to copy to the destination server.
The DHCP server the policies will be copied to.
The DHCP server the policies will be copied from.
Specifies specific policy names to copy to the destination server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an IP Address of the destination scope to copy the policies to.
Specifies an IP Address of the source server scope to copy the policies from.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.

maml:introduction.maml:para: Copies all policies from a source DHCP server to the localhost

command:example.maml:title: EXAMPLE 2

maml:introduction.maml:para: Copies specific policies from a source DHCP server to the localhost

command:example.dev:code: C:\PS> Copy-DhcpPolicy -FromServer 'dhcp1.contoso.com' -PolicyName 'All HQ Clients', 'All Warehouse Devices'

maml:introduction.maml:para: Copies the specified source scope's policies to a different scope on the localhost

maml:description.maml:para: Copies DHCP scopes from one server to another.
Copies an IPv4 scope from a source DHCP server to a destination DHCP server. Individual scope id's can be specified, but if left $null, it will copy over all scopes.
The DHCP server the scopes will be copied to.
The DHCP server the scopes will be copied from.
Specifies the IP Addresses of the scopes to copy. If this is left $null then all scopes on the source DHCP server will be copied over to the new one.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.
Specifies the IP Addresses of the scopes to copy. If this is left $null then all scopes on the source DHCP server will be copied over to the new one.
The DHCP server the scopes will be copied to.
The DHCP server the scopes will be copied from.
Specifies the IP Addresses of the scopes to copy. If this is left $null then all scopes on the source DHCP server will be copied over to the new one.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.
Indicates to not copy the source scope's Option values to the new destination scope.

maml:introduction.maml:para: Copies all scopes from a remote DHCP server to the localhost
Copies only specific scopes from a source server to a remote destination server

maml:description.maml:para: Copies DHCP server option definitions from one server to another.
Recreates all or specific DHCP server option definitions on the target DHCP server. If the OptionId on the destination already exists, then no action is taken.
The source server the DHCP server option definitions will be copied to.
The source server the DHCP server option definitions will be copied from.
Specifies specific OptionId's to copy over.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.
Specifies specific OptionId's to copy over.
The source server the DHCP server option definitions will be copied to.
The source server the DHCP server option definitions will be copied from.
Specifies specific OptionId's to copy over.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.

maml:introduction.maml:para: Copies all source server options to the localhost
Copies only specific OptionId's to the destination server.

maml:description.maml:para: Copies DHCP server option values from one server to another.

Sets the destination's server option values with the values from the source DHCP server. An error is thrown if the destination does not contain the OptionId definition. By default, if the destination has a value for a given OptionId, the incoming value is ignored. This behavior can be overridden with the '-OverwriteValues' switch.
The source server the DHCP server option values will be copied to.
The source server the DHCP server option definitions will be copied from.
Specifies specific OptionId's to copy over.
Specifies if the copy process finds that the destination DHCP server has an existing value set for a particular OptionId, it will be overridden with the incoming value.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.
Specifies specific OptionId's to copy over.
Specifies if the copy process finds that the destination DHCP server has an existing value set for a particular OptionId, it will be overridden with the incoming value.
The source server the DHCP server option values will be copied to.
The source server the DHCP server option definitions will be copied from.
Specifies specific OptionId's to copy over.
Specifies if the copy process finds that the destination DHCP server has an existing value set for a particular OptionId, it will be overridden with the incoming value.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.

maml:introduction.maml:para: Copies all server option values to the localhost
Copies specific OptionId values to a remote DHCP server

maml:description.maml:para: Copies DHCP user/vendor classes from one server to another.

Copies one or multiple user/vendor classes from one DHCP server to another. Any existing classes on the destination that have matching names will be automatically excluded, and the destination class will NOT be overridden.
The DHCP server the classes will be copied to.
The DHCP server the classes will be copied from.
One or more user/vendor class names to specified to copy.
The class type to filter by on the 'From' DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.
One or more user/vendor class names to specified to copy.
The class type to filter by on the 'From' DHCP server.
The DHCP server the classes will be copied from.
The DHCP server the classes will be copied to.
One or more user/vendor class names to specified to copy.
The class type to filter by on the 'From' DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the destination DHCP server.
Specifies credentials to use when contacting the source DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the destination DHCP server.
Specifies an already established CimSession to the source DHCP server.
